remarks: Define W-atoms corresponding to an arbitrary "fiducial (i.e. reference) atom" ` d ` .  These are all atoms not in the polarity of ` { d } ) ` , which is the hyperplane determined by ` d ` .  Definition of set W in [Crawley] p. 111.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2012.)
